Message.Title: marissa-transparency
Message.Msg: marissa- you just had a two day meeting with the board & you are going to spell out expectations for the employees tues.! sounds good- now in those two days of meetings with the board did you ever mention that the stockholders would like to know how the company intends to use the money? if not sure- can you mention how long it will take to reach a decision? aol informed their stockholders that they would notify them in around 15 days ( by end of month & did so) when they received the patent money! your topic is TRANSPARENCY ( employees & STOCKHOLDERS) we hope it works both ways! thank you

Message.Title: Would I pay $450M on Marissa's plan announcment??
Message.Msg: NO Unless the plan will be full of revenue growth and real plan to monetize the 750M email users. If every user would generate $10/year profit for buying somethings they need throughout the year, that could really excite the stock. Lots of people think Yahoo enterprise value is close to ZERO in reaching current valuation. Well is Marissa's plan about to reveal something no one had foreseen? Is she going to show MSFT how to build BING and asking for a bigger cut of payment? Is Yahoo front page going to look REALLY SIMPLE like Google"s? Yahoo has been a content aggregator but failed to capitalize on it. How does Marissa integrate the high content front page with simplicity ? $450M in expectation to jump on the plan? I am guessing a short term 20 to 25% jump on this news is a fair return for a quick insider info bet.

Message.Msg: what idiots

Topic.Title: If Obama wins the election

Message.Msg: January 3rd, 2007 was the day that Barney Frank took over the House Financial Services Committee and Chris Dodd took over the Senate Banking Committee. The economic meltdown that happened 15 months later was in what part of the economy? BANKING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES! THANK YOU DEMOCRATS (especially Barney ) for taking us from 13,000 DOW, 3.5 GDP and 4.6% Unemployment...to this CRISIS by (among MANY other things) dumping 5-6 TRILLION Dollars of toxic loans on the economy from YOUR Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac FIASCOES! (BTW: Bush asked Congress 17 TIMES to stop Fannie & Freddie -starting in 2001 because it was financially risky for the US economy). Barney blocked it and called it a "Chicken Little Philosophy" (and the sky did fall!) And who took the THIRD highest pay-off from Fannie Mae AND Freddie Mac? OBAMA And who fought against reform of Fannie and Freddie? OBAMA and the Democrat Congress, especially BARNEY !!!! So when someone tries to blame Bush... REMEMBER JANUARY 3rd, 2007.... THE DAY THE DEMOCRATS TOOK OVER!" Bush may have been in the car but the Democrats were in charge of the gas pedal and steering wheel they were driving the economy into the ditch. Budgets do not come from the White House.. They come from Congress and the party that controlled Congress since January 2007 is the Democratic Party. Furthermore, the Democrats controlled the budget process for 2008 & 2009 as well as 2010 & 2011. In that first year, they had to contend with George Bush, which caused them to compromise on spending, when Bush somewhat belatedly got tough on spending increases. For 2009 though, Nancy Pelosi & Harry Reid bypassed George Bush entirely, passing continuing resolutions to keep government running until Barack Obama could take office. At that time, they passed a massive omnibus spending bill to complete the 2009 budget . And where was Barack Obama during this time? He was a member of that very Congress that passed all of these massive spending bills, and he signed the omnibus bill as President to complete 2009. Let's remember what the deficits looked like during that period: If the Democrats inherited any deficit, it was the 2007 deficit, the last of the Republican budgets. That deficit was the lowest in five years, and the fourth straight decline in deficit spending. After that, Democrats in Congress took control of spending, and that includes Barack Obama, who voted for the budgets. If Obama inherited anything, he inherited it from himself . In a nutshell, what Obama is saying is "I inherited a deficit that I voted for, and then I voted to expand that deficit four-fold since January 20th." There is no way this will be widely publicized, unless each of us sends it on! " The problems we face today exist because the people who work for a living are outnumbered by those who vote for a living."

Message.Title: Yahoo's Marissa Mayer to unveil turnaround strategy Tuesday
Message.Msg: Yahoo Inc. CEO Marissa Mayer will unveil her new strategy for the company at meetings on Tuesday, All Things D reports. Mayer sent out a memo Friday on the plans, following two days of meetings with Yahoo's (NASDAQ: YHOO) board of directors over her strategy for a turnaround of the struggling Internet company. Mayer is expected to push renewed efforts in search and advertising, as well as a revamp of Yahoo mail and the content hub's home page. Two meetings are planned, one in the morning and one in the afternoon to accommodate international staff. The memo said employees would be informed of discussions at the board level "in an act of radical transparency that will be a tradition moving forward."

Message.Title: Yahoo should be trading above $20 soon and very soon...
Message.Msg: With the cash from selling Alibaba (up to $12B), Yahoo could buyback up to 50% of its current float which would increase its EPS from $1 to $2. $20 would mean 10 P/E only (current P/E is 18). Not to mention billions of cash Yahoo is generating from its operation and another $4B - $5B from selling Yahoo Japan, with these cash, Yahoo could eventually decrease its float to 20% of its current float which could increase its EPS from $1 to $5!. $50 wouldn't be a dream if the P/E is still 10 only. Then Yahoo will sell its core search and ad business to MSFT or APPLE or whoever wants it at a decent price. I believe this is the plan of Third Point. If I were Leob, I will do the same thing. I don't think Third Point and Leob are going to wait for too long and this is happening now!!!

Topic.Title: Yahoo should be trading above $20 soon and very soon...

Message.Msg: I don't know what you are trying to say or to confuse people and yourself. Let me explain it in a simple way: 1. If assume Yahoo stock will never rise even with massive stock buyback and remains at $16, 80% of floating shares like yours if you have any will be bought back at cheap price, thus Yahoo EPS will rise from $1 to $5 if the profit remains the same. So now people realize that Yahoo is only selling at P/E 3, they would push Yahoo price to at least P/E 10 which would be $50. 2. If you sold your share today at $16, during the process of Yahoo buy back, Yahoo share will for sure rise due to higher demand (if not, refer to 1), you won't earn anything either. So either way, Yahoo price will rise dramatically due to massive buyback. Let me explain this in further, if assume Yahoo spent $15B cash(Yahoo will get $16B cash from selling all of Alibaba and Yahoo Japan) bought back 80% of its float at $16 and all the Yahoo shareholders other than Third Point had been stupid enough selling it at low price. Yahoo would now have only 200M floating shares(20% of current float) left, Yahoo market capital would be $16 * 200M = 3.2B, yet Yahoo still have $3B - $4B cash on book with a EPS $5, P/E 3. Yahoo deservers a price of $50, P/E 10. If there is not enough shareholders stupid enough to sell at low, Yahoo price will rise to a higher level say at least $20... I believe not many people are stupid enough to sell Yahoo now.

Message.Title: NTWK $6.8 Up 2%.......Hottest NASDAQ stock….Price and Volume up every day......Short-term Target: $10++…...Fundamentals can support $16 per analysts with $21 max target. …..Strong 2013 guidance calls for over 30% revenue growth and $1/share net income due to strong global demand for its Legacy and Cloud software solutions…….Cloud Division is growing exponentially.....Only 6 PE and 1 times sales is 30% of sector average...... In 2010 it went from $8 to $24 in 4 weeks with 50% lower revenues
Message.Msg: Analyst Target: $16 per Upgrade………Take a look at incredible NTWK chart.....3M share float In 2010 NTWK went from $8 to $24 in a few weeks. Today NTWK is a much stronger company with far more revenue sources including new Cloud Divisions. Unlike 2010, NTWK today has the flexibility to deliver reliable software products and services not only from Pakistan but also from excellence centers located in Bangkok, Beijing, the US, and the UK. The float today is 1/10 of what it was then and 2013 revenues are expected to breakaway into the mid $40 million for the first time in company history. During 2010 (and 2007) NTWK's market cap reached over $100 million on 50% lower revenues of what is projected for 2013. During the September 4Q CC NTWK officials stated that revenues are expected to reach $100 Million in 2015 up significantly from the $38 Million reported in 2012. They also expect margins to continue to go up as the high-margin Cloud divisions keep continuing exponentially to revenues. MUST READ ……This Week’s Analysts Comments on Upgrade: We project 13% annual growth to FY14 from FY10 reflecting 80 significant NFS legacy customers in FY14, up from 52, 37, and 28 in FY12, FY11, and FY10, respectively. The new Vroozi Cloud Division contributed $1.3 million in FY12. We expect at least $4 million in FY13 and $6 million to FY14 Our price target is based on the average forward 2013 P/E multiple of 13.2X (up from 12.8X in August 2012). NTWK is trading at 6.4X our FY13 projections. We are forecasting EPS of $0.85 per share. We applied an 11X multiple to our FY13 EPS forecast. We anticipate a richer multiple as earnings momentum builds in FY13. The company guidance calls for $1/share net income in 2013. NTWK is entering FY13 with a $25 million backlog and approximately $100 million in qualified leads. One quarter of the backlog is from four new NFS platform customer implementations that began in 4Q12. In August 2011, NetSol launched its Cloud Vroozi Division, an e-procurement search tool for SAP supplier relationship management (SRM) users. SAP AG is a global vendor of enterprise management systems that has the largest market share (24%) based on a worldwide Gartner survey. Vroozi should provide sales diversification and a higher margin recurring revenue stream. The Vroozi division contributed $1.3 million in FY12 sales and is expected to grow to $4 million in revenues in 2013 NTWK announced its 2nd Cloud Division last week offering an array of products and services to capture a greater % of the cloud applications in North America. The company is implementing this division using their significant software development capabilities and infrastructure. === MORE NTWWK HIGHLIGHTS: - Company projects Doubling/Tripling revenues and net income by 2015 - Significant Institutional investor ownership and growing - Insiders bought over 5% of the Outstanding shares the last 2 years and never sold a single share - Total share count is only 7.5 million shares. The float is only 3 million shares - Trading at forward PE of 5 - Strong balance sheet with $1.5/share cash - Has global agreement with Mercedes Benz - Already 7 countries with NTWK software for leasing and financing Mercedes Benz/Daimler including China, India, Japan, and others…and a few more coming in quarters/years ahead. - No.1 in China and APAC in leasing/financing software products and services. NTWK has over 50 Fortune 100 loyal customers. Never lost a customer. None of the customers is over 5% of the total revenues - partial customer list: CitiGroup, Mercedes Benz, Santander, BMW, Volvo, Ford, GE Capital, Cisco Capital, Paribas, GMAC, Volvo, Toyota, Nissan, Hyundai, BYD, SANY Corp. China, etc. About NTWK: NetSol Technologies, Inc. ((NASDAQ: NTWK) is a worldwide provider of global IT and enterprise application solutions that include credit and finance portfolio management systems, SAP consulting and services, custom development, systems integration, and technical services for the global Financial, Leasing, Insurance, Energy, and Technology markets. Headquartered in Calabasas, Calif., NetSol's product and services offerings have achieved ISO 9001, ISO 20000, ISO 27001, and SEI (Software Engineering Institute) CMMI (Capability Maturity Model) Maturity Level 5 assessments, a distinction shared by only 178 companies worldwide. The company's clients include Fortune 500 manufacturers, global automakers, financial institutions, utilities, technology providers, and government agencies. NetSol has delivery and support locations in San Francisco, London, Beijing, Bangkok, Lahore, Adelaide, Rio de Janeiro, and Riyadh

Topic.Title: a share buyback does nothing, but they already bought back 650,000,000- if they announce that we all lose. it has to be a reduction in share count, the buyback doesnt do that

Message.Msg: In theory, the buyback reduces the net shares outstanding. Unless they give those shares out to officers and employees the net number of shares is reduced. The price per share should go up proportionately. I dont mind them using revenue to buy back up to 300 million shares....but i would rather yhoo used its cash to expand company.

Message.Title: There may direct competition with Goog through Facebook-Yahoo search partnership. Things will get interesting!
Message.Msg: I see much better times ahead and new more robust revenue streams through partnerships and know how being delivered to Facebook on how to monetize mobile adds and search VIA Yahoo/Meyer's know how. Let's see what she has to deliver. I suspect it will be well received!

Message.Title: IF Yahoo can help people save $200 on people monthly repeat exoenses
Message.Msg: Using WalMart / Cost Co buy wholesale model and pass on saving for: 1- Auto Insurance 2- Restaurants 3- Travel + Entertainment 4- Cell + cable + direct TV + internet services 5- Health Care 6- Gym + spa + yoga etc People spend those repeatedly month after month. That is why speculation is that Groupon, Yelp + 4 square are within targets of Marissa. Now 750M people will gradually sign on to spend $$ via Marissa's new Yahoo. They will view Yahoo like they view WalMart + Cost Co. If Yahoo can start out netting profit AVG $10/member, $7.5 Billion profit is going to TRIPLE the valuation........ When you become RELEVANT in people's life and help them save $$, you will be richly rewarded.
